text: Moominiiney Siinik woo saaku Bukah derre keenit (koros kinnuk) caba mari korosut Qeb abaah ken lagsamkeh (lawsamkeh) gambik gambih gexa num, hinnay Muslimiin Buttat yangalemkeh aba kaa akke waytek, toysa usuk Nummah Yallak kaxxa naqabu luk yaduureeh orbeyna kaak jahannam gira, jahannam gira is manxu gacta gacsimeynaay
